    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected abstract void initNodeToSink()
      Initialize a queue for the communication from Node to Sink.
      protected abstract void initRPC()
      Initialize a Remote Procedure Call mechanism to add a new node to the pool Sink Side: run a RPCServer thread that listens to nodes' registration requests Node Side: call the Remote Procedure and assign the response to the nodeID
      protected abstract void initSinkToNode()
      Initialize an exchange for the communication from Sink to Node.
      abstract void receiveModel(Model deliveredModel)
      Receive a model Sink Side: a new model arrived on the NodeToSink queue Node Side: a new updated model has been published on the SinkToNode exchange
      abstract void sendModel()
      Send a model Sink Side: publish an updated Model on the SinkToNode exchange Node Side: put the new model in the NodeToSink queue

    • Method Detail

      • initNodeToSink

        protected abstract void initNodeToSink()
        Initialize a queue for the communication from Node to Sink. Sink Side: start to consume arriving Models in the queue Node Side: just declare the queue that will be used to send Model to the Sink

      • initSinkToNode

        protected abstract void initSinkToNode()
        Initialize an exchange for the communication from Sink to Node. Sink Side: just declare the exchange on which updated Models will be published Node Side: get a temporary queue and bind it to the exchange, then start consuming the arriving Models

      • initRPC

        protected abstract void initRPC()
        Initialize a Remote Procedure Call mechanism to add a new node to the pool Sink Side: run a RPCServer thread that listens to nodes' registration requests Node Side: call the Remote Procedure and assign the response to the nodeID

      • receiveModel

        public abstract void receiveModel(Model deliveredModel)
        Receive a model Sink Side: a new model arrived on the NodeToSink queue Node Side: a new updated model has been published on the SinkToNode exchange
        Parameters:
        deliveredModel - received Model

      • sendModel

        public abstract void sendModel()
        Send a model Sink Side: publish an updated Model on the SinkToNode exchange Node Side: put the new model in the NodeToSink queue
